title: Do you need a COVID test? A University of Chicago expert breaks down testing do's and don'ts during the Omicron surge
content:
1. Do you need a COVID test? A University of Chicago expert breaks down testing do's and don'ts during the Omicron surge  Chicago Tribune
  2. FDA: Antigen tests may have reduced sensitivity detecting Omicron  POLITICO
  3. Have omicron variant symptoms? Why you can’t get a rapid COVID test  Deseret News
  4. FDA says antigen tests may be less sensitive to omicron | TheHill  The Hill
  5. FDA: COVID antigen tests can detect Omicron, but there may be some false negatives  Seeking Alpha
